ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] SECRETS TO UNLIMITED PLATINUM
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve warned the person. If they violate the rules by posting this sort of crap again I will ban them. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
I've warned the person. If they violate the rules by posting this sort of
crap again I will ban them.
luv,
-Su

> This is some sorry ass move, selling in-game shit for rl cash. Id like to
> not see things like this on the list please.
>

> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] SECRETS TO UNLIMITED PLATINUM
